name: Overgrowth (itch) (HumanInTheory, gabs, polyphorge, ChillinRaptor)
description:
A rapid-paced shmup with platforming elements made for the first ever Lospec Jam. 

Made by Me(Keth), Gabs, Polyphorge, ShidoEngie, and ChillinRaptor

This game takes place in a far-far future where Axolotls for some reason rule the world, or whats left of it. Unfortunately humans are dumb and managed to destroy themselves and there home, which is now a barren wasteland. However, a mysterious and ancient dungeon lies beneath the surface, can you brave the courage to venture through its heart for seemingly no reason?

Move: Arrow keys, WASD

A button: X or Space

B button: C or Alt

Start button: Z or Enter

Also playable with controller: Left stick for move, standard button mappings
